name: react-native-google-mobile-ads
author: Invertase <oss@invertase.io> (http://invertase.io)
description: React Native Google Mobile Ads is an easy way to monetize mobile apps with targeted, in-app advertising.

scripts.build:clean: rimraf android/build && rimraf ios/build && rimraf lib
scripts.lint:code: yarn lint:js && yarn lint:android && yarn lint:ios:check
scripts.lint:spellcheck: spellchecker --quiet --files="docs/**/*.md" --dictionaries="./.spellcheck.dict.txt" --reports="spelling.json" --plugins spell indefinite-article repeated-words syntax-mentions syntax-urls frontmatter
scripts.tests:android:build: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox build --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.tests:android:build-release: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox build --configuration android.emu.release
scripts.tests:android:test: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --loglevel trace
scripts.tests:android:test:debug: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --inspect
scripts.tests:android:test-reuse: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --reuse
scripts.tests:android:test-cover: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --loglevel trace --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.tests:android:test-cover-reuse: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --reuse
scripts.tests:ios:build: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.tests:ios:build-release: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox build --configuration ios.sim.release
scripts.tests:ios:test: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:ios:test:debug: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --loglevel warn --inspect
scripts.tests:ios:test-reuse: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --reuse --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:ios:test-cover: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.tests:ios:test-cover-reuse: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --reuse --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:ios:pod:install: cd RNGoogleMobileAdsExample && cd ios && rm -rf RNGoogleMobileAdsExample.xcworkspace && rm -f Podfile.lock && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
